apply_grid
Apply grid to to ggplot2::ggplot

#### Description 
 
Apply grid to to ggplot2::ggplot

#### Usage 
<pre><code>
apply_grid(p, formula, scales = "free_y", ...)
</code></pre>

#### Arguments 
 
* ``p`` ggplot2::ggplot instance
* ``formula`` stats::formula instance
* ``scales`` Scale value passed to ggplot2
* ``...`` other arguments passed to methods
